entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
